a.n: Objectif Mont-blanc, Sur Les Traces D'un GÃ©ant

p.d: As an internationally renowned natural monument, Mont Blanc inspires and fascinates mountain enthusiasts and laypersons. It has long been the object of many remarkable studies as men and scientists have tried to unveil its mysteries. Led by a mountain guide, a multi-disciplinary scientific rope team spend five days exploring it. Directed by: Vincent Perazio (France, 2015)
